text: aho nabivaraya! (visvasavantayinta mese pavasanna) numbala biriyan dikkasada karana vita ovunge idda va (porottu kalaya) ganan kirimata pahasu vana ayurin numbala ovun dikkasada karanu. tavada idda kalaya gananaya karanu. tavada numbalage paramadhipati vu allahta biya bætimat vanu. pæhædili duracarayak samaga ovun pæminiya nam misa ovunge nives valin numbala ovun pituvahal nokaranu. emenma ovun da pitaviya noyutuya. tavada eya allahge simavanya. tavada kavareku allahge simavan ikmava yanne da evita sæbævinma ohu ohutama aparadha kara gatteya. min pasu va yam karunak allah æti karannata puluvana yana vaga numba nodannehiya
